name: Connect
description: Connect to the server.

name: ShowWaitingGames
description: Show the waiting games.

name: CreateGame
description: Create a new game session.

name: JoinGame
description: Join an existing game session.

name: PickHidden
description: Pick a hidden component from the deck.

name: PickVisible
description: Pick a visible component by index.

name: PlaceLast
description: Place the last drawn component on the board.

name: PlaceAndPickHidden
description: Place a component and pick a hidden one.

name: PlaceAndPickVisible
description: Place a component and pick a visible one.

name: PlaceAndPickEvent
description: Place a component and draw an event deck.

name: PlaceAndPickBooked
description: Place a component and pick a booked one.

name: PlaceAndReady
description: Place a component and mark ready.

name: Discard
description: Discard the component in hand.

name: Book
description: Book a visible component.

name: PickBooked
description: Pick a previously booked component.

name: PickDeck
description: Pick up an event card deck.

name: PutDownDeck
description: Put down an event card deck.

name: Destroy
description: Destroy a component at given coordinates.

name: Ready
description: Declare you are ready.

name: TimerReset
description: Reset the building timer.

name: Roll
description: Roll the dice.

name: Close
description: Disconnect and exit the game.

name: ShowSpaceship
description: Show the structure of a player's spaceship.
